In this episode I share with your some of my youtube influences, and some up and comer channels I enjoy. I also discuss my favourite online terrain building community. Last I talk a bit about the upcoming Oath of the Frozen king supplement by Absolute Tabletop.














Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
